title: Writers' Tricks of the Trade: 39 Things You Need to Know About the ABCs of Writing
description: Writers' Tricks of the Trade is like the appetizer table at a writers' banquet table. The 39 chapters are written in lively prose spiced with tips, techniques and tricks presented in alphabetical order for easy reference. Real world information that every fiction writer needs to know presented in an easy-to-read style.People in the industry praise it as a valuable guide.
author: Morgan St. James
